entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 07 January 2023
